hints.content:
Find $14$ on the scale of the graph.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of People and the vertical axis labeled Favorite Type of Movie. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Comedy, Scary, Adventure, Cartoon, and Mystery. The bar line for each type of movie shows the following: comedy bar line extends to 20, scary bar line extends to the middle of 4 and 8, adventure bar line extends to the middle of 8 and 12, cartoon bar line extends to the middle of 8 and 12, and mystery bar line extends to 16. A red line is drawn up from the middle of 12 and 16 across the graph. !

hints.content: On the scale, all bars ending below $14$ show amounts of less than $14$.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of People and the vertical axis labeled Favorite Type of Movie. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Comedy, Scary, Adventure, Cartoon, and Mystery. The bar line for each type of movie shows the following: comedy bar line extends to 20, scary bar line extends to the middle of 4 and 8, adventure bar line extends to the middle of 8 and 12, cartoon bar line extends to the middle of 8 and 12, and mystery bar line extends to 16. A red line is drawn up from the middle of 12 and 16 across the graph. Cartoon, adventure, and scary bars ending to the left of the red line are highlighted. !

hints.content: Scary, adventure, and cartoon movies were the favorite of fewer than $14$ people.

question.content:
Lola asked her classmates their favorite types of movies and graphed the results.

[[☃ image 1]]

**Which of the following types of movies were the favorite of fewer than $14$ people?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of People and the vertical axis labeled Favorite Type of Movie. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Comedy, Scary, Adventure, Cartoon, and Mystery. The bar line for each type of movie shows the following: comedy bar line extends to 20, scary bar line extends to the middle of 4 and 8, adventure bar line extends to the middle of 8 and 12, cartoon bar line extends to the middle of 8 and 12, and mystery bar line extends to 16. !
